data.title: Meet Our Team
data.meta_description: CONTACT US We are who we are because of our people ADELAIDE BRISBANE MELBOURNE PERTH SYDNEY PARTNER SOLUTIONS CLAIMS ADELAIDE Adelaide State Manager SA Kimberly Maisey National e-business Manager Kirsty…
data.text:
State Manager SA

Kimberly Maisey

With 20 years insurance industry experience, Kimberly joined Berkley Insurance Australia in January 2019 as a Financial Lines Underwriter and has a proven track record in underwriting.

Prior to joining Berkley, Kimberly held a very long and well established underwriting career at QBE which saw her underwrite a variety of insurance products.

Kimberly has excellent communication skills which is demonstrated by the ability to work with people of diverse backgrounds and hold long standing client relationships within the Insurance Industry.

Whilst known to have a competitive streak (both personally and professionally), Kimberly thoroughly enjoys a challenge and is a very dedicated, self-driven and focused individual who is organized, disciplined and goal oriented.

Outside of work, she is supermum to her two children and superwife to her husband and if she isn’t at home you will find her either shopping, F45’ing or on a walk exploring beautiful South Australia.

National e-business Manager

Kirsty Owens

Kirsty Owens brings a wealth of knowledge with over two decades of expertise in Professional Indemnity (PI), Directors & Officers (D&O), and Public Liability (PL). Her extensive experience spans across prestigious underwriting and brokerage firms in Australia and London.

As the former State Manager for South Australia, Kirsty led a skilled team of underwriters dedicated to meeting the intricate insurance needs of brokers and clients in Adelaide. In her recent transition to the role of e-Business Manager, she applies her significant industry acumen to oversee the strategic growth and management of Berkley Insurance Australia’s e-business distribution channels.

Kirsty holds a Business Degree and a Master’s Degree, and is distinguished as a Fellow of the Australian and New Zealand Institute of Insurance and Finance (ANZIIF). Her appointment underscores BIA’s focus on pioneering digital solutions in the insurance landscape.

Senior Underwriter General Liability SA

Phillip Paull

Phil began his insurance journey as an Environmental Insurance Broker, before dedicating over a decade as an Environmental Underwriter with a global insurer. Throughout his career, he earned a reputation as a top-tier technical underwriter and played a pivotal role in the growth of Australia’s emerging Environmental Insurance market.

Phil’s extensive underwriting experience spans General Liability, Professional Indemnity, Property, Management Liability, and Directors & Officers insurance. He brings a proven track record of stable, sustainable underwriting and has built trusted relationships across Australia, the APAC region, and internationally. Now, as Senior Underwriter – General Liability (SA), Phil continues to leverage his expertise and industry connections.

Outside of work, Phil is an avid hockey goalkeeper, enthusiastic traveller, and a DIY enthusiast.

Phil holds a Bachelor of Science with First Class Honours in Zoology from Monash University.

State Manager - QLD

Paul Kelly

Paul holds a Bachelor of Business from the University of Technology, Sydney and is a Fellow of ANZIIF.

Paul has been in the financial services industry for 30 years beginning in the stock market before moving to insurance in 1993. Paul has undertaken a number of roles from portfolio management and liability underwriting for various insurers to a corporate insurance broker for local and international broking firms across a wide variety of industries from manufacturing, mining, property development to health services. Currently, Paul is the Qld & NT State Manager for Berkley Insurance Australia, based in Brisbane and also has the role of Casualty underwriter.

National Head of New Product Development & Senior Underwriter

Nicole Carey

Nicole has a Bachelor of Biomedical Science, Juris Doctor and a Diploma of Financial Services.

Nicole has a split role at Berkley Insurance Australia. Nicole shares her time between Financial Lines Underwriting in our Brisbane team and nationally as a Wording Technician.

Nicole has over 20 years’ experience in the industry with a particular focus on professional indemnity, directors’ & officers’ liability and management liability insurance policies. Nicole has 15 years’ experience working for large international insurance brokers which provides her with a unique understanding of the pressures faced by brokers on a daily basis.

Nicole enjoys working with brokers and Berkley Insurance Australia underwriters to create solutions for their clients.

Senior Underwriter Financial Lines

Jess Kettle

Jess holds a Bachelor of Commerce from University of Wollongong and has been in the insurance industry for 12 years working across all lines.

Specialising in Financial Lines underwriting, Jess joined Berkley Insurance Australia in December 2021 and enjoys working with her brokers to find solutions for their clients

She is a committee member of YIPS Queensland and will most likely see you at the next industry event!

Senior Underwriter General Liability/Financial Lines

Rebecca Minte

1 part underwriter, 1 part negroni drinker, 2 parts documentary lover

Rebecca began her insurance career in 2015 first working with an international insurer and then an underwriting agency before joining the team at Berkley Insurance Australia underwriting both General Liability and Financial Lines in October 2017.

Prior to insurance, Rebecca worked for a German technology start-up – first working with them in Berlin and then relocating with them to Sydney in October 2012.

Rebecca holds an Honours Degree in Accounting and Finance, two Masters degrees in related disciplines and is currently an Associate member of ANZIIF studying for her Diploma of General Insurance.

Underwriter

Emily Meddings

Emily Meddings specialises in Financial Lines and General Liability Underwriting. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for her field, she boasts 6 years of experience in the insurance industry. She embarked on her career in medical indemnity and administration, which paved the way for her subsequent role as Assistant Underwriter at DUAL Australia. In May of 2022, Emily took her talents to BIA, eager to embrace new challenges.

Educated at the University of Queensland, Emily earned a Bachelor of Arts with majors in Economics and Criminology. She further expanded her academic repertoire with a Master of Criminology and Criminal Justice from Griffith University. When she’s not delving deep into the nuances of underwriting, she proudly waves the flag as an avid Carlton supporter.

State Manager - VIC/TAS

Trish Cuthbert

With a career in the insurance industry that has spanned over three decades since 1988, Trish’s specialised focus lies within Directors & Officers (D&O) and Management Liability (ML) insurances. This focus has served her well throughout her extensive tenure in major insurance providers and underwriting agencies, continuously proving invaluable in her roles.

Trish is known for her natural problem-solving skills and a keen eye for process improvement. Her commitment to providing a first-class experience for brokers and clients stands out as a hallmark of her work ethic.

Beyond Trish’s professional responsibilities, she has a strong dedication to the growth and success of her colleagues. Actively engaging in mentoring and supporting team members, firmly believing that the team’s success reflects each individual’s contribution.

Senior Underwriter - Financial Lines

Brenton Fielder

Brenton is a plant dad that has been with the Berkley Team since 2014, starting in Sydney and then relocating to the Melbourne office in 2016.

Coming from a broking background with a strong focus on financial lines products, Brenton has a clear understanding of the stresses and strains that both brokers and underwriters face when providing the best and most appropriate cover for clients across a vast array of industries.

Brenton has a broad depth of experience to pull from when he is assessing risks after working in many different industries from mining and construction in Townsville, to marketing and branding in Sydney, before starting his insurance life and putting down roots in Melbourne… For now.

Financial Lines Underwriter

Steve Taylor

Steve joins Berkley Insurance Australia having spent the last few years working in Commercial Broking, specialising mainly in financial lines of insurance. Prior to Commercial Broking, Steve gained experience within the industry working as part of a facilities team broking to the healthcare and professional services sectors, along with experience working in Products and Partnerships.

Steve enjoys building strong relationships, as well as working with others to better understand risk exposure and mitigation.

When in the office you will often find Steve on the phone, pacing the floor while engrossed in conversation to a broker dissecting a risk.

Outside of work, he will be in one of the many record stores or live music venues throughout Melbourne due to his avid interest in all things music.

General Liability Underwriter

Jane Makin

Jane has been in the insurance industry over 15 years, having completed a traineeship at a farm insurer and then moving on to Business Development and Underwriter roles. She dipped her toes into the broking world, but couldn’t stay away from underwriting, joining the Liability team in Berkley Insurance in early 2023.

Jane is country girl, having grown up in the Mallee, and whilst she lives in Melbourne now, she gets back to the farm for some country air whenever she can.

She has two young children who keep her busy, is sports mad, and enjoys heading out to watch her beloved Western Bulldogs and Vixens when she can find the time. She has a competitive streak on the netball court and some may even say she has a bit of ‘white line fever’!

General Liability Underwriter

Katie Thiessen

Katie joined BIA in November 2023 as a Business Support Officer, making her way into the General Liability Underwriting team shortly after in July 2024. Whilst she is new to the industry, Katie has demonstrated her ability to adapt her problem-solving skills and flair for customer service to the insurance sector.

With background studies in engineering as well as obtaining her pilot’s licence at 16 years of age, Katie has a keen eye for detail and loves to take a methodical approach when it comes to obtaining the best outcomes for brokers and insured’s.

Outside of work hours, you will often find Katie hanging out with her two cavoodles or considering going to the gym (but not actually going).

State Manager - WA

Jason Tomerini

Jason joined the Berkley Insurance Australia team in 2014 and has been in the Insurance Industry since 1993, holding various roles with:

SGIO

Mercantile Mutual

Aon

AIG

Jason believes strongly in the fundamentals of insurance, the promise it delivers & value of exceptional service.

He is a devoted family man, his wife is from Prague, in the Czech Republic and they share a daughter & son together. As a family, they enjoy travelling specifically to the Czech Republic visiting their extended family.

Jason’s major hobby and enjoyment is playing golf having been a member of The Vines Golf & Country Club in the Swan Valley from 2006.

Liability Underwriter

Andrea Day

I started in Insurance back in 2012 with WFI Insurance as a Service Consultant and assistant to the Area Managers for Commercial and residential policies

Then I started with Berkley Insurance Australia Perth, in July 2015 as a BSO and worked my way up to my current position of Assistant Underwriter in July 2020

I am doing all SCTP/Steadfast online PL submissions and have a limited book of open market accounts. I assist Adelle Timmins (Senior PL UW PERTH) with all aspect of the PL accounts for Perth

Chief Executive Officer

Tony Wheatley

Tony Wheatley has over 35 years’ experience in underwriting, claims, reinsurance and portfolio management. His expertise lies largely in the PI, D&O and medical malpractice classes having worked his way through various underwriting positions before moving into management roles.

Joining W.R.Berkley in July of 2012, his background includes a broad expertise in managing insurance companies, managing general agents and insurance and reinsurance portfolios.

Tony and the management team at Berkley Insurance Australia are committed to ensuring we continue to provide the best possible products and services to our brokers through local underwriters who are empowered to make decisions with an expectation that service, in the broadest sense, is at the core of what we do.

Senior Underwriter Financial Lines

Suzy Ljubic

Suzy has been Underwriting insurance for the past 13 years focusing on Professional Indemnity, Medical Malpractice, IT Liability, Management Liability and Associations Liability. After completing a bachelor in business Suzy began her career in the insurance industry in an admin role at QBE, her passion for problem solving and building client relationships landed her in a role as an underwriter and then she spent the following 12 years at Vero.

Suzy has brought a wealth of experience and charisma to the BIA team. Suzy prides herself in attention to detail when comes to assessing risks for each business or profession and creates a tailored solution that suits her client’s needs. Liaising with brokers directly is the BIA way and Suzy is always happy to assist and provide her expertise to variety of cases.

Assistant Underwriter

Ben Holl

Ben quickly rose from Business Support Officer to Assistant Underwriter in just one year with BIA. His enthusiasm for connecting with others is as strong as his interest in learning the nuances of underwriting. Although new to the insurance industry, he has shown remarkable potential and adaptability.

Outside of work, Ben enjoys sports and social outings with friends, bringing the same energy and team spirit to his professional role. He’s excited to dive deeper into his underwriting career and be a valuable team player.

National Senior Partner Solutions Underwriter

Matt Rawle

Matt has over 20 years’ experience in the insurance industry predominantly in the Financial and Professional Lines space. Over this time, he has worked for International Brokers, International and Australian insurance companies and at a Medical Defence Organisation specialising in Medical Indemnity.

In his role as National Senior Partner Solutions Underwriter at Berkley Insurance Australia, Matt enjoys managing our coverholder relationships with underwriting consistency, clarity and a fast turnaround to underwriting referrals. He also likes to consider innovative solutions to coverholder issues with the ultimate mutually beneficial goal of making it easier to do more business with us.

Senior Claims Adjuster

Kerry McManus

Kerry is a legally qualified insurance professional specialising in medical

malpractice and professional indemnity. Kerry has experience in claims both nationally and internationally. Kerry started her career in a private litigation practice in Ireland, before moving to Australia and taking up a claims role in a niche allied health insurer. Kerry moved on to work with a major international insurer where she managed a portfolio of high profile

blue-chip clients including private hospitals.

Kerry role at BIA sees her managing a varied portfolio, including significant claims for and health professionals, lawyers and accountants.

Senior Claims Adjuster

Paul Galloway

Paul is an experienced claims professional who has worked in both local and London markets. Most recently he worked in-house for Global law firm DLA Piper providing a tailored claims service to a significant Berkley Insurance Australia corporate client.

Paul has experience in the management of a variety of claims across the classes of business underwritten at Berkley Insurance Australia particularly in the Australian financial sector.

Paul’s commerce degree and study to become a member of the Chartered Institute of Management Accountants (CIMA) brings an invaluable resource to the team.

Senior Claims Adjuster

Darren Quek

Darren has many years of experience in the insurance industry, starting his career overseas as an auditor for an international accounting firm then later as a solicitor in NSW for several national law firms in the insurance litigation field. Prior to joining BIA, Darren worked inhouse as a claims solicitor for one of Australia’s largest supermarket chains handling its liability claims. Darren’s experience sees him adopting a strategic approach to claims management to achieve an optimal outcome for stakeholders. Darren is responsible for the day-today management of a wide variety of claims nationally in the professional indemnity, public liability and management liability space including claims against health professionals, accountants, lawyers and construction professionals and is a strong addition to the BIA claims team.

Senior Claims Adjuster

Patrick Haselhurst

Patrick is legally qualified and has over 15+ years in the claims departments of major Insurers (AMP, Jardine Lloyd Thompson, and Royal & Sun Alliance/Vero) and 12+ years in private legal practice. His claims and legal insurance experience include Public Liability, Professional Indemnity, Product Liability, D&O, Home Warranty, Workers Compensation, ISR, CTP, Property and Travel.

He brings a wealth of experience and knowledge to the BIA claims team and he is keen to utilise his expertise to support other claims staff. His approach to claims is strategic, commercial and thorough and suits him to complex matters that require strong analytical skills.

Claims Adjuster

Abhishek Chaudhary

Abhi is a thorough and motivated professional with several years’

insurance experience working for a major self-insurer. Abhi has a

naturally empathetic skill set that results in excellence in his service

offering. His analytical mind, as a result of his Masters of Accounting training, and sincere and enthusiastic commitment to work as part of a team that holds client expectations as central to its business makes him ideally suited to be a valuable asset to BIA’s claims team.

Communication sits at the core of Abhi’s value proposition of managing claims proficiently across several lines of BIA’s business.

Claims Adjuster

Raphael Saccasan

Raphael comes from a law background practising in commercial litigation. His expertise in that field moved him into claims handling where he spent the next 6 years working for brokerages including Aon and a start-up company as the sole claims handler.

Raphael decided to expand his career and move to the insurer side of claims by joining award-winning claims team at Berkley Insurance Australia at the beginning of 2020.

Multi Lines Claims Adjuster

Doris Mihajlovic

Doris plays a key role at BIA as a Multi Lines Claims Adjuster, primarily focusing on Public Liability and EPL claims, backed by five years of experience in customer service and three years in the insurance building sector. Her journey of continuous professional growth has recently seen her attain a Cert IV in General Insurance through ANZIIF, enriching her adeptness in general insurance claims management.

Currently, Doris is navigating through the completion of an LPAB, reinforcing her legal acumen in the insurance domain. She also serves as an active committee member of the Young Insurance Professionals (YIPs), ensuring she remains attuned to industry innovations and networking opportunities. Her background empowers her to enhance outcomes via strategic problem-solving and critical thinking, aligning proficiently with BIA’s claims philosophy and focusing on the best outcome for the insured.

Junior Multi Lines Claims Adjuster

Aman Kainth

Amandeep Kainth is a dedicated Junior Multi Lines Claims Adjuster at Berkley Insurance Australia. With a Bachelor in Business majoring in Accounting, he brings a strategic approach to claims handling. Amandeep’s passion for the insurance industry led him to Berkley Insurance Australia in February 2022.

With a sharp eye for detail and a passion for helping clients during challenging times, Amandeep is committed to delivering exceptional service and making a positive impact in the insurance world. Specialising in liability claims, he provides personalised attention to every case. Amandeep’s empathy and analytical skills ensure efficient and effective claim resolutions, making him an invaluable asset to the team.

Claims Adjuster

Vinitha Srikanth

With 11 years of experience in the Insurance Industry, Vinthia specialises in life and health insurance sectors. She is both a Commerce graduate and a diploma in Human Resource Management. Her expertise spans claim processing, quality control and handling training.

Vinthia is recognised for her enthusiasm, self-motivation and impactful mentoring. Her engaging and positive attitude complements her professional skills. At Berkley, she aims to enhance her knowledge and advance her career while contribute her extensive experience and passion for the Insurance Industry.
